doc.field: New York City COVID-19 Food Studies Web Collection
New York City COVID-19 Food Studies Web Collection

This website documents the efforts of Heart of Dinner, an organization cofounded by Ying Chang and Moonlyn Tsai. Heart of Dinner is an extension of #LOVINGCHINATOWN, launched by Chang and Tsai in response to COVID-19 "to counter the racism and isolation the Asian-American immigrant elderly have been experiencing throughout the pandemic." Heart of Dinner works with restaurant partners to provide meals and care packages to communities members facing food scarcity and isolation as a result of the COVID-19 global pandemic. The website includes a short video documentary, photos of community members, calls to action including requests to support the organization's GoFundMe and requests for individuals to send notes and decorate bags for community members.
Heart of Dinner Archived Website: September 2020-ongoing
